subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Ngog and Yossi Benayoun scored second-half goals to lead Liverpool over visiting Sunderland, 2-0, and keep alive faint hopes of catching first-place Manchester United in England’s Premier League. Ngog scored in the 52nd minute off Steven Gerrard’s headed pass, and Benayoun connected from close in the 65th after goalkeeper Marton Fulop dropped the ball at his feet.
